MissionDescription.NonLocaleText:
This map can be played by 2 to 4 people.
To win, you have to hold the enemy base without losing your home base (there are bases, the East Flag & the West Flag).
The reinforcements are sent in accordance with the names of flags.
Having combinations of flags gives a team an opportunity to get mixed reinforcements.
To hold a flag you should leave some troops near it.
